name: uvs
description: Automatically run `uv sync` for Python projects that use uv (pyproject.toml detection).

scripts.code-install: npm run compile && npx vsce package --out uvs.vsix && code --install-extension uvs.vsix
scripts.ant-install: npm run compile && npx vsce package --out uvs.vsix && Antigravity --install-extension uvs.vsix
scripts.all-install: npm run compile && npx vsce package --out uvs.vsix && code --install-extension uvs.vsix && Antigravity --install-extension uvs.vsix

uvs.command.description: Command to run for syncing (default: 'uv sync').

uvs.autoEnable.description: Automatically run the sync command when a Python project (pyproject.toml) is opened.

uvs.delaySeconds.description: Seconds to wait after activation before running the sync command.
